title: payload plugin does not load on standard solr 1.4.0 distribution
description:
Hi,
I have succeeded running and querying with PayloadTermQueryPlugin, 
When I ran my test against an embedded solrj server it ran fine, Im using maven solr 1.4 artifacts.
When I deployed it into my servlet container the plugin didn't load, the war in the servlet container came from a standard Solr 1.4 downloaded tar.gz
When I changed the jar in the WEB-INF/lib folder to the jars from the maven repository, the plugin loaded.
Just need to synch the distibution with the maven repositories

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
I don't really understand what the issue is here.

PayloadTermQueryPlugin is not currently part of solr ... it's being tracked in SOLR-1485.

what is "it" in the sentence "When I deployed it into my servlet container the plugin didn't load" ? ... what do you mean by "deployed" (are we talking about a war? a jar? .. how was "id" deployed?

what jar are you talking about in "When I changed the jar in the WEB-INF/lib" ?

this sounds like a usage question ... there doesn't seem to be an actual bug report here.

Please start a thread on solr-use describing exactly what it is you are trying to do, and what kinds of behavior/ouptut you are describing ... then if it's determined there is an actual bug somewhere we can re-open
